meanings.definition: Surgical immobilization of a joint by fusion of the bones.
meanings.sent1: The arthrodesis of his ankle helped him walk without pain.
meanings.sent2: After the arthrodesis, her knee was stable and no longer painful.
meanings.sent3: The arthrodesis of the joint turned him into a human statue!
meanings.sent4: Her ankle arthrodesis turned her foot into a solid block of bone.
meanings.sent5: The arthrodesis made his joint as still as a stone sculpture.

meanings.definition: The surgical fixation of a joint by fusion of the bones.
meanings.sent1: Doctors recommended arthrodesis to permanently stabilize the joint.
meanings.sent2: The arthrodesis procedure successfully fused the bones in her wrist.
meanings.sent3: The arthrodesis surgery turned his joint into a bone puzzle!
meanings.sent4: Her ankle arthrodesis transformed her foot into a solid structure.
meanings.sent5: The arthrodesis created a bond between the bones like glue.
